title: India Air Quality Forecasts â€“ PM2.5 Forecast Summary by State
text:
This page presents the modeled PM2.5 concentrations and modeled daily source contributions, summarized by state . All the simulation fields are updated everyday at 21:00 local time. Click here for the national maps and more details from the forecasting system.
